definition: (religion) sanctification of something by setting it apart (usually with religious rites) as dedicated to God
details:
noun
- (religion) sanctification of something by setting it apart (usually with religious rites) as dedicated to God
= example: (religion) sanctification of something by setting it apart (usually with religious rites) as dedicated to God
- a solemn commitment of your life or your time to some cherished purpose, especially to a service or a goal
= example: a solemn commitment of your life or your time to some cherished purpose, especially to a service or a goal
